message_def.name: QueryManipulatorSpecifications
message_def.description: This message shall cause the receiving service to reply to the requestor with a ID 4600h: ReportManipulatorSpecifications message. A logical AND shall be performed on the requested presence vector and that representing the available fields from the responder. The resulting message shall contain the fields indicated by the result of this logical AND operation.

message_def.name: QueryElement
message_def.description: This message is used to query an element from a list. The element is uniquely identified by the UID.

declared_fixed_field.name: ElementUID
declared_fixed_field.interpretation: UID of the queried element. A value of zero (0) represents the first (head) element in the list.

message_def.name: QueryElementList
message_def.description: This message is used to query all elements from a list.

message_def.name: QueryElementCount
message_def.description: This message is used to query the number of elements in a list.

message_def.name: QueryActiveElement
message_def.description: This message is used to query the current active element of an executing list.
